title: RSI Divergence on ES 5min
hypothesis: Bullish divergence (price makes lower low while RSI makes higher low) predicts short-term reversal in ES futures
counterparty: Retail traders trapped in downtrend who panic sell at lows
edgeSource: Behavioral bias - late shorts covering when momentum wanes
source: De Prado 'Advances in Financial ML' + TradingView community backtests
